statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, brand_mentions FROM social_media_data ORDER BY brand_mentions DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT post_id, engagement_score FROM social_media_data WHERE brand_mentions = 0;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE brand_mentions = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM social_media_data WHERE brand_mentions > 0;
SELECT post_id, engagement_score, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 4 AND 7 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, engagement_score, brand_mentions FROM social_media_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%exciting%' ORDER BY brand_mentions ASC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sentiment_id, customer_id, sentiment_score FROM CustomerSentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, sentiment_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND post_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY likes_count DESC, comments_count ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY likes_count DESC, comments_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sentiment_id, sentiment_category, sentiment_score FROM CustomerSentiments WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, engagement_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 75
SELECT customer_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_engagement_score FROM customer_engagement
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 ORDER BY post_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, perception FROM brand_perception WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_date FROM customer_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT p.post_content, s.sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis s JOIN brand_perception p ON s.post_id = p.perception_id;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM sentiment_analysis GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_sentiment > 0.4;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(perception) AS perception_count FROM brand_perception GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY perception_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_details FROM engagement_data ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT sentiment_category, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT brand_id, campaign_name, engagement_level FROM brand_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_date, engagement_type FROM engagement_data ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM customer_data JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_data.customer_id = sentiment_analysis.customer_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT brand_id, campaign_name, engagement_level FROM brand_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY brand_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT post_id, post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, comment_text, comment_date FROM customers JOIN comments ON customers.customer_id = comments.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT post_text, post_date, likes_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, comment_text, comment_date FROM customers JOIN comments ON customers.customer_id = comments.customer_id;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score, sentiment_type FROM posts JOIN sentiments ON posts.post_id = sentiments.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
